testcase.name: User filter the case using single parameter row
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page to the FreeCRM.......................passed When User enter the username and password...................................passed Then User should logged in and should be on the home page...................passed Given User should click on show filter......................................passed When User select title, operator and value and click filter.................passed Then User should see that particular filtered cases.........................passed

testcase.name: User clear filters
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page to the FreeCRM.......................passed When User enter the username and password...................................passed Then User should logged in and should be on the home page...................passed Given User should see filtered cases........................................passed When User click on clear....................................................passed Then User should see cases dashboard page...................................passed
